perihelion.py

geminids.perihelion.perihelion(age=2000)

Calculates the location a perihelion of Phaethon (3200) that occured within 2 years of age

Args: age (int, optional): How long in the past to calculate the perihelion of

  1. Phaethon. Defaults to 2000.

Returns

  • perihelion (ndarray) – Position vector of the perihelion location

  • t_start (float) – The ephemeris time of when the perihelion occured

  • xy (ndarray) – The state vectors of the 2 year period that contains the perihelion
